trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sunol
There were no other sightings in Sunol on or around November 5th 2012
Summary: 4-5 hovering round lights in crescent shape with 2-3 craft flying near them
divs: sighting detailsi was driving in my car at about 25 mph beteween 6-7pm on mon 11\5\12 at the time the objects were observed. they appeared to be about 5-10 miles ssw from my location on bernal ave in pleasanton ca. this would possibly be in the sunol-fremont-mission san jose ca area. hard to estimate as i am driving and there are trees and terrain changes. there appeared to be 4-6 spherical lights and they all appeared to be about the same size. they were in somewhat of a comma\reverse crescent pattern just hovering but there were perhaps 2-3 craft moving near them and their flight pattern was more like a helicopter. when i tried to get to a higher elevation to hopefully see better (about 5 mins later) they were no longer visible.
